metadata.name: Navigation Card
metadata.description: Card component for navigation with title, summary, and link. Features flexible layout with image support and icon display options.
metadata.author: CivicTheme

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Theme variation controlling the visual appearance

image_as_icon.title: Image as Icon
image_as_icon.description: Whether to display the image as an icon instead of a full image

attributes.title: HTML Attributes
attributes.description: Additional HTML attributes to apply to the root element

modifier_class.title: Modifier Classes
modifier_class.description: Additional CSS classes for styling variations

image.title: Card Image
image.description: Optional image for the navigation card

url.title: Image URL
url.description: URL path to the card image

alt.title: Alt Text
alt.description: Alternative text for the image (required for accessibility)

link.title: Navigation Link
link.description: Link object for the navigation destination

text.title: Link Text
text.description: Display text for the link (usually same as title)

url.title: Link URL
url.description: URL to navigate to when card is clicked

is_new_window.title: Open in New Window
is_new_window.description: Whether to open the link in a new window/tab

is_external.title: External Link
is_external.description: Whether the link is external (affects styling and behavior)

examples.title: Navigation card heading which runs across two or three lines
examples.summary: Bring to the table win-win survival strategies to ensure proactive domination.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: Icon name/symbol to display instead of or alongside the image

title.title: Card Title
title.description: Main title/heading for the navigation card

summary.title: Card Summary
summary.description: Descriptive text that explains the navigation destination
examples: Learn about our comprehensive service offerings
Discover our company history and mission

content_top.title: Top Content
content_top.description: Content area at the top of the card for badges, labels, or additional information

image_over.title: Image Overlay
image_over.description: Content to overlay on top of the image

content_middle.title: Middle Content
content_middle.description: Content area between title and summary for additional details

content_bottom.title: Bottom Content
content_bottom.description: Content area at the bottom of the card for additional actions or information

layout.responsive: Uses container queries to switch from column to row layout
layout.flexbox: Flex container with responsive direction changes
layout.container_query: Changes layout at navigation card orientation threshold

requirements: Card title must be provided for rendering
Image alt text must be provided when using images
Link should have proper focus states and keyboard navigation
Wide link area should be implemented for better usability

properties: Wide link implementation for entire card clickability
aria.keyboard: Full keyboard navigation through interactive elements

considerations: Ensure sufficient color contrast for text over images
Provide meaningful alt text for decorative and informational images
Consider screen reader experience with wide link areas

performance.loading: Consider lazy loading for images below the fold
performance.images: Optimize image sizes for different breakpoints

guidelines: Always provide a meaningful title for the card
Consider image aspect ratios for consistent layouts
Use icons when appropriate for category identification

examples.title: Basic Navigation Card
examples.description: Simple navigation card with title and link
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:navigation-card' with { theme: 'light', title: 'Services', summary: 'Explore our service offerings', link: { url: '/services', text: 'View Services' } } only %}

examples.title: Card with Image
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:navigation-card' with { theme: 'light', title: 'About Us', image: { url: '/images/about.jpg', alt: 'Team photo' }, link: { url: '/about' } } only %}

examples.title: Icon Navigation Card
examples.description: Navigation card using icon instead of large image
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:navigation-card' with { theme: 'light', title: 'Contact', icon: 'phone', summary: 'Get in touch with us', link: { url: '/contact' } } only %}

best_practices: Write clear summaries that explain the destination
Use consistent image sizes across navigation cards
Choose appropriate icons that represent the content
Test responsive behavior with different content lengths

unit_tests: Image as icon mode works properly
accessibility_tests: Screen reader accessibility of card content
Focus management and wide link behavior
Image alt text presence and quality

extraction.notes: Complete component analysis including container query usage, responsive image handling, and flexible icon/image display options
